workflow.name: Bulk TikTok video download without watermark to Google Drive with tracking
workflow.description:
### üé• Bulk TikTok Video Download Without Watermark to Google Drive

This workflow automates the process of downloading TikTok videos and uploading them to Google Drive. It reads TikTok URLs from a Google Sheet, downloads the video using the [TikTok Video Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/tiktok-video-downloader23) ‚Äî a tool for **downloading TikTok videos without watermark in HD quality** ‚Äî uploads it to Drive, makes it public, and updates the same sheet with the Drive link.

---

## üîß What It Does

1. ‚úÖ **Manually triggered** when ready to run.
2. üìÑ **Reads TikTok URLs** from a Google Sheet.
3. üîÅ **Loops through each URL** one at a time.
4. üåê **Fetches video download links using the [TikTok Video Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/tiktok-video-downloader23)** ‚Äî a reliable **TikTok video downloader without watermark**.
5. ‚¨áÔ∏è **Downloads each video** in **high-definition (HD)** format using the direct media link.
6. ‚òÅÔ∏è **Uploads the video to Google Drive**.
7. üîì **Sets public sharing permission** for the video.
8. ‚úèÔ∏è **Updates the original Google Sheet** with the public Drive URL.

---
## üìã Google Sheet Example

Make sure your sheet has at least these columns:

| url                                 | drive_link (to be auto-filled) |
|-------------------------------------|--------------------------------|
| https://www.tiktok.com/@user1...    | *(blank initially)*            |
| https://www.tiktok.com/@user2...    | *(blank initially)*            |

> The workflow reads from `url` and fills in `drive_link` after upload.

---

## üß© Nodes Used

| Node Name                     | Type              | Purpose                                               |
|------------------------------|-------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|
| When clicking ‚ÄòExecute‚Äô      | Manual Trigger     | Starts the workflow manually                          |
| Get Data From Google Sheets  | Google Sheets      | Fetches rows (TikTok URLs)                            |
| Loop Over Items              | Split In Batches   | Iterates over each row                                |
| Call TikTok Downloader       | HTTP Request       | Gets video download link from [TikTok Video Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/tiktok-video-downloader23) |
| Wait                         | Wait               | Optional delay to prevent overload                    |
| Download File                | HTTP Request       | Downloads HD video using media link                   |
| Upload File In Google Drive  | Google Drive       | Uploads the video to Google Drive                     |
| Set Public Permission        | Google Drive       | Makes the uploaded file publicly accessible           |
| Update Row In Google Sheet   | Google Sheets      | Adds Drive link to the same row                       |
| Sleep                        | Wait               | Small delay between each iteration                    |

---

## üìù Requirements

- ‚úÖ Google API credentials (Service Account) with access to:
  - Google Sheets
  - Google Drive
- üîê RapidAPI Key for [TikTok Video Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/tiktok-video-downloader23) ‚Äì a **TikTok video downloader without watermark (HD supported)**
- üóÇ A Google Sheet with a `url` column containing TikTok video URLs


---

## üß© Challenges Solved

| ‚ùó Challenge | ‚úÖ Solution |
|-------------|-------------|
| TikTok video URLs often have watermarks and low quality | Used [TikTok Video Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/tiktok-video-downloader23) API for **HD + no watermark** download links |
| No easy way to bulk download and organize TikToks | Automated fetching, downloading, and uploading using **n8n + Google Drive** |
| Manual video saving and re-uploading to Drive is time-consuming | Eliminated all manual steps with a fully automated workflow |
| Tracking which videos are already processed | Automatically updates the **Google Sheet** row with the final Drive link |
| Drive files are private by default | Automatically sets **public sharing permission** on uploaded videos |
| Risk of API rate limits or throttling | Added **Wait nodes** and batch processing to avoid overload |

---

## üéÅ Benefits

| üåü Benefit | üí¨ Description |
|------------|----------------|
| üöÄ Saves Time | Fully automates a previously manual workflow |
| üé• High Quality Content | Videos downloaded are **HD + watermark-free** ‚Äî ready for reuse or archives |
| üîÅ Reusable Setup | Can process **unlimited TikTok URLs** via the Google Sheet |
| üìä Organized Output | Keeps track of source URL and uploaded Drive link in a single sheet |
| üîê Secure but Shareable | Drive links are auto-shared **publicly** while remaining under your control |
| üîÑ Scalable | Can be run daily, weekly, or triggered by new rows ‚Äî completely scalable |
| üí∏ Cost-Effective | No need for paid tools or manual freelancers ‚Äî runs on n8n + free APIs |

---


## üí° Use Cases

- Content curation from TikTok
- Archiving user-submitted TikToks
- Automating social-to-cloud workflows
- Bulk migration of video content
- Saving **TikTok videos in HD without watermark** for sharing or archiving

---

## üìå Tips

- Replace manual trigger with Cron for full automation.
- Use the [TikTok Video Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/tiktok-video-downloader23) responsibly ‚Äî check API limits.
- Store metadata (e.g., uploader, hashtags) in additional Google Sheet columns.
- This tool helps ensure you're always downloading **high-quality TikTok videos without watermark**.

---

parameters.content:
# üì• Bulk TikTok Video Downloader & Google Drive Uploader

## üîÑ What This Flow Does
> **Automatically downloads TikTok videos from a list of URLs in a Google Sheet, uploads them to Google Drive, makes the videos publicly accessible, and updates the Google Sheet with the new Google Drive links.**

---

## ‚úÖ Benefits of This Flow

- üöÄ **Fully automated**: No manual downloads, uploads, or updates.
- üßæ **Centralized tracking**: Keeps original TikTok URLs and uploaded Google Drive links in the same Google Sheet.
- üîÅ **Batch processing**: Processes multiple videos with loop handling and delays.
- üîì **Public access**: Files are automatically set to public in Google Drive.
- ‚è±Ô∏è **Time-saving**: Reduces hours of manual work to a few minutes.
- üë• **Team-friendly**: Any team member can add a link to the sheet and get a Drive URL back.

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Challenges Solved by This Workflow

| ‚ùå Problem                              | ‚úÖ Solution Provided by Flow                         |
|----------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------|
| Manual TikTok video downloads          | Automated via external API                          |
| Tedious Google Drive uploads           | Automated upload with public permission             |
| No easy sharing of video files         | Google Drive shareable link generated and updated   |
| Lack of tracking processed items       | Google Sheet updated with each Drive URL            |
| High risk of human error               | Fully systemized with minimal manual touchpoints    |

---

## üß© Core Components 

- **Manual Trigger** ‚Äì Starts the workflow manually.
- **Get Data From Google Sheets** ‚Äì Fetches TikTok URLs from a sheet.
- **Loop Over Items** ‚Äì Iterates over each URL one at a time.
- **Call TikTok Downloader** ‚Äì Uses an API to get the downloadable video link.
- **Wait** ‚Äì Adds delay before downloading to avoid rate limits.
- **Download File** ‚Äì Downloads the TikTok video file.
- **Upload File In Google Drive** ‚Äì Uploads the video to your Google Drive.
- **Set Public Permission Google Drive** ‚Äì Makes the uploaded file publicly accessible.
- **Update Row In Google Sheet** ‚Äì Updates the original sheet with the new Drive link.
- **Sleep** ‚Äì Adds delay between batches for reliability.

---

## üü¢ When clicking ‚ÄòExecute workflow‚Äô
Manually triggers the workflow for testing or running on-demand.

## üìÑ Get Data From Google Sheets
Reads all rows from a specific Google Sheet containing TikTok video URLs.

## üîÅ Loop Over Items
Processes each row from the sheet one-by-one (batch looping).

## üåê Call TikTok Downloader
Sends each TikTok URL to the RapidAPI TikTok downloader to get a direct video download link.

## ‚è≥ Wait
Adds a short pause before downloading the file (helps prevent rate-limiting).

## ‚¨áÔ∏è Download File
Downloads the video from the `medias[1].url` provided by the TikTok downloader API.

## ‚òÅÔ∏è Upload File In Google Drive
Uploads the downloaded video to Google Drive in the root folder.

## üîì Set Public Permission Google Drive
Makes the uploaded video file publicly accessible by setting sharing permissions.

## ‚úèÔ∏è Update Row In Google Sheet
Updates the same row in the sheet by matching `url`, adding the new Drive `webViewLink` in the `driveurl` column.

## üí§ Sleep
Pauses briefly and loops back to process the next TikTok URL in the list.
